mapper.select: select pet_UID, fk_idx, pet_name, pet_type, pet_birthday, pet_size, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_neutral, medical_history, allergy, pet_profileimg from pet_info where fk_idx = #{fk_idx} and pet_status in('1','2') order by pet_UID desc
mapper.insert: insert into pet_info(pet_UID, fk_idx, pet_name, pet_type, pet_birthday, pet_size, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_neutral, medical_history, allergy, pet_profileimg) values(seq_pet_info_UID.nextval, #{fk_idx}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_type}, #{pet_birthday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pet_size, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pet_weight, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pet_gender, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pet_neutral, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medical_history, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allergy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pet_profileimg, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select caretype_UID, caretype_name, caretype_info from caretype

select previouspet_UID, previouspet_name , pet_UID, fk_idx, pet_name, pet_type, pet_birthday, pet_size, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_neutral, medical_history, allergy, pet_profileimg , nextpet_UID, nextpet_name from ( select lag(pet_UID, 1) over(order by pet_UID desc) as previouspet_UID , lag(pet_name, 1) over(order by pet_UID desc) as previouspet_name , pet_UID, fk_idx, pet_name, pet_type, pet_birthday, pet_size, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_neutral, medical_history, allergy, pet_profileimg , lead(pet_UID, 1) over(order by pet_UID desc) as nextpet_UID , lead(pet_name, 1) over(order by pet_UID desc) as nextpet_name from pet_info where pet_status = 1 ) V where pet_UID = #{pet_UID}
